title: [COMPLETE] Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.15 - 06/08/2015
body: On 06/08/15, starting at 02:30 AEST, ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.15. At 04:00 AEST, the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 6 hours.

replies.body: After the new patch, all the fonts became too big and over laps on my screen!
PLEASE adress this riot. its making some of us unable to play properly.
yea iv seen that happen quite abit when you farm a lot and also have high level
Once it stopped bugging out, I quite like the new font and I think it was a really good move to put the score and KDA back in the top right.
